website_summaries.verdict: A spacious tote bag that's great for a road trip or airline travel.
pros: The canvas bag is made up of recycled materials and can be thrown in the washing machine for easy cleaning
Inside, users will find a useful zippered pouch that can be detached from the bag itself
The bottom of the bag features thick material for extra protection against wear and tear
cons: It's very roomy, so it's easy to over pack with this bag

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it... It's bigger than it looks in the picture but I'm ok with that as it will hold a lot of stuff when I'm travelling on the weekend ...... I went on a flight with it and it fits nicely as a cart on ... the material is really think... it will definitely be able to last a really long time even if it's used often . Looks very expensive too
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: BAGGU Soft - Sided Travel Denium Bag..
customer_reviews.text: This Baggu Bag is absolutely perfect for my upcoming get away weekend..the material is soft, sturdy, large inside pocket for phone, wallet..the sides are soft..perfect..Full zipper, either shoulder strap, or handles, nice large size..I would definetly purchase again.. Thank you Amazon for picture after delivered, sent to me..thank you soo much..
customer_reviews.author: Annie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Baggu is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this bag. I use it as my beach bag and it fits a ton of stuff. Baggu is a great brand, I have a couple of their smaller bags and I'm really happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Grunig

customer_reviews.title: --Big, tough and roomy! Everything I wanted and more!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go-to carry case for work and work-out. Tough and can hold everything. I can't say enough good things about it. Would absolutely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: it's a lot bigger than i expected! it will hold TONS! love it!
customer_reviews.author: kelizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Gigantic weekend bag that's not marred up by inner pockets. I often love those but it's also great to have a bag that you can just drop a stack of clothes into. It holds a ton.
customer_reviews.author: rochester book girl

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bag because it's simple and feels well made. However, after the 2nd use, the zipper broke and will now only zip from one side.
customer_reviews.author: naylo1975

customer_reviews.title: Quality canvas and heavy duty shoulder and hand straps. ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality canvas and heavy duty shoulder and hand straps. It was a gift for my wife who used it for weekend overnight trips.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Pennsylvania

customer_reviews.title: Bagged the right bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who wanted a weekend/beach bag to use on our honeymoon. She used the heck out of this thing the entire trip, and she's still using it for trips that we take! For example, we just took it to Utah for a hiking trip with some friends. We also take it to picnics, the Hollywood Bowl, Dodger games, etc. For all the miles that we've put on it already, it's still in pretty good shape, other than some dirtiness, which can't be helped, obviously. Definitely a worthy buy!
customer_reviews.author: Yong L.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my parents
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. High quality material. I bought this one for my parents. They saw the one I had and liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Emo

customer_reviews.title: Really like this travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Really like this travel bag! It's huge, seems durable, and fits so much but it also fits easily under airplane seats (depending on how packed it is) and it fits easily in airplane overhead storage. Wouldn't recommend checking it out - it will get really dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Warek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for use as my carry-on for flights primarily. I did a test pack for a week vacation to NYC I have coming up, and was easily able to pack clothes for a week, 2 pair of shoes, toiletries, an extra purse, and still had ample room to bring back any vacation purchases. The bag is the perfect size for an overhead compartment, and even full of essentials, wasn’t too heavy, and the two different straps make it so easy to carry. The fabric is thick & sturdy with out being heavy and the seams are well constructed. Two very enthusiastic thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie patrinostro

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The base of the bag measures 13" long x 8" deep. The top of the bag measures 26" long. The height is 13 inches. This is a very large tote but an average size for a weekender bag. For the price and plain/basic design, I was expecting a larger bag. Not sure if I'm going to keep it. Quality seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Steady

customer_reviews.title: Waaaay too heavy
customer_reviews.text: The olive is a great color and design but it’s waaay too heavy while empty. Just heavy canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia E.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality bag that is the perfect size to fit everything you need for an overnight/weekend trip. I was worried it would be comically huge, but it looks normal in person. It has a detachable interior pouch and handles + a strap for easy carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Vixxaxn

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag that holds everything! Its bigger than I thought but makes for perfect weekender or carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zipper
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful, big, nice bag. I love the color. I gave three stars because after only 2 uses, the zipper broke and now it’s useless. I’ve contacted the company and will update my review based on their response.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Aaronson

customer_reviews.title: It’s very nice.
customer_reviews.text: It’s compact, but large enough to pack essentials for the plane or the beach.
customer_reviews.author: William Robison

customer_reviews.title: A classic, go-to weekend bag
customer_reviews.text: Simply, stylish, roomy and functional. I use it for so many things, I am thinking about getting one or two more.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Washington

customer_reviews.title: Straps fell apart after a few months! It’s very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Baggu purchase. Never again. The bag is really heavy. I gave to my boyfriend, because it was too heavy for me to use as a carry on. After 5 or 6 months the straps completely unravelled where you grip them. Crazy overpriced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgit J Fitzgerald

product_meta.title: BAGGU Women's Weekend Bag, Roomy and Durable Canvas Carry-on Travel Tote
product_meta.description: An extra roomy over the shoulder tote, perfect for daily shlepping and overnight trips. Lightweight bag folds up for compact easy packing, making it ideal for use aA roomy and durable canvas bag for weekend travel or everyday toting. Updated design features exterior pocket for easy access on the go. Two sets of handles for in hand carrying or over the shoulder toting. Fits perfectly in the overhead bin. 15.5 in. H x 26 in. W x 10.5 in. D. 12 in. shoulder strap drop, 6 in. handle drop. Heavy duty zipper closure. 100% recycled cotton.
feature_bullets: A roomy and durable canvas bag for weekend travel or everyday toting.
Updated design features exterior pocket for easy access on the go.
Two sets of handles for in hand carrying or over the shoulder toting.
15.5 in. H x 26 in. W x 10.5 in. D.
